Information for Students and their Parents

  • Cedar Valley CoderDojo Code of Conduct - All students and their parents are expected to be familiar with this document.
  • Calendar of upcoming Dojo meetings Please note that starting fall of 2015 we are encouraging participants to “register” for dojo meetings in advance to help us plan for enough mentors.

    • September's Waterloo Meeting
    • October's Cedar Falls Meeting
    • October's Waterloo Meeting
    • November's Cedar Falls Meeting
    • November's Waterloo Meeting
    • December's Cedar Falls Meeting
    • December's Waterloo Meeting
  • Glossary - Knowing the proper name for something is almost as important as knowing how to use it. This is a list of some of the vocabulary terms you may hear when we talk about programming in general and with Scratch.
